amendment.description: An amendment numbered 43 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit the use of funds from being used to finalize, implement, administer or enforce CPSC's proposed rule on Voluntary Remedial Actions and Guidelines for Voluntary Recall Notices.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 43 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit the use of funds from being used to finalize, implement, administer or enforce CPSC's proposed rule on Voluntary Remedial Actions and Guidelines for Voluntary Recall Notices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A035) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 179 (Roll no. 391).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A035) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 179 (Roll no. 391).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Mullin.
